    • Method Detail

      • addRetailer

        public SirqulResponse addRetailer(Long accountId,
                         String name,
                         String streetAddress,
                         String streetAddress2,
                         String city,
                         String state,
                         String postalCode,
                         String businessPhone,
                         String businessPhoneExt,
                         String website,
                         String facebookUrl,
                         String twitterUrl,
                         String logoFilePath,
                         Long logoAssetId,
                         String picture1FilePath,
                         Long picture1AssetId,
                         String picture2FilePath,
                         Long picture2AssetId,
                         List<Long> categoryIds,
                         List<Long> filterIds,
                         Location location,
                         Boolean createDefaultLocation,
                         Enums.ResponseFormat responseFormat)
                           throws SirqulException
        Create a retailer record. A billable entity must be created first before a retailer record can be made.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        name - The name of the retailer
        streetAddress - The street address
        streetAddress2 - Additional address information (such as a suite number, floor number, building name, or PO Box)
        city - The city
        state - The state
        postalCode - The postal code
        businessPhone - The business phone
        businessPhoneExt - The business phone extension
        website - The website of the retailer
        facebookUrl - The facebook URL of the retailer
        twitterUrl - The twitter URL of the retailer
        logoFilePath - File path to the retailer logo sent as a multipart binary file (you can optionally use logoAssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        logoAssetId - The retailer logo asset id
        picture1FilePath - File path to optional store-front pictures or product pictures or etc. A multipart binary file (you can optionally use picture1AssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        picture1AssetId - An asset id
        picture2FilePath - File path to optional store-front pictures or product pictures or etc. A multipart binary file (you can optionally use picture2AssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        picture2AssetId - An asset id
        categoryIds - Comma separated list of category IDs used to filter retailers by categories
        filterIds - Comma separated list of filter IDs used to filter retailers
        location - The current location of the user
        createDefaultLocation - Determines whether to create a default location using the retailer information
        responseFormat - The format of the returned response {JSON // default , HTML // for Dojo support when uploading assets}
        Returns:
        StringResponse if responseFormat equals Enums.ResponseFormat.XML or Enums.ResponseFormat.HTML and a WrappedResponse<RetailerFullResponse> if responseFormat equals any other Enums.ResponseFormat. On error, returns SirqulResponse with message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • addRetailerLocation

        public SirqulResponse addRetailerLocation(Long accountId,
                                 Long retailerId,
                                 String name,
                                 String streetAddress,
                                 String streetAddress2,
                                 String city,
                                 String state,
                                 String postalCode,
                                 String businessPhone,
                                 String businessPhoneExt,
                                 String website,
                                 String internalId,
                                 String detailsHeader,
                                 String detailsBody,
                                 String hours,
                                 String logoFilePath,
                                 Long logoAssetId,
                                 String picture1FilePath,
                                 Long picture1AssetId,
                                 String picture2FilePath,
                                 Long picture2AssetId,
                                 List<Long> categoryIds,
                                 List<Long> filterIds,
                                 Location location,
                                 String building,
                                 Enums.ResponseFormat responseFormat)
                                   throws SirqulException
        Creates a location record for a retailer. Only the owner and the employees of the retailer have access to do this.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/location/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        retailerId - The ID of the retailer
        name - The name of the retailer location
        streetAddress - The street address of the retailer location
        streetAddress2 - Additional address information (such as a suite number, floor number, building name, or PO Box)
        city - The city
        state - The state
        postalCode - The postal code
        businessPhone - The business phone
        businessPhoneExt - The business phone extension
        website - The website of the retailer location
        internalId - An internal identifier used by the retailer
        detailsHeader - A brief description about the retailer location (255 character limit)
        detailsBody - A detailed description about the retailer location
        hours - The hours of operation
        logoFilePath - The file path to the retailer location logo sent as a multipart binary file (you can optionally use logoAssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        logoAssetId - The retailer location logo asset id
        picture1FilePath - The file path to an optional store-front pictures or product pictures or etc. A multipart binary file (you can optionally use picture1AssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        picture1AssetId - An asset id
        picture2FilePath - The file path to an optional store-front pictures or product pictures or etc. A multipart binary file (you can optionally use picture2AssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        picture2AssetId - An asset id
        categoryIds - Comma separated list of category IDs used to filter retailer locations by categories
        filterIds - Comma separated list of filter IDs used to filter retailer locations
        location - The current location of the user
        building - the building
        responseFormat - The format of the returned response {JSON // default , HTML // for Dojo support when uploading assets}
        Returns:
        StringResponse if responseFormat equals Enums.ResponseFormat.XML or Enums.ResponseFormat .HTML and a WrappedResponse< RetailerLocationResponse> if responseFormat equals any other Enums.ResponseFormat. On error, returns SirqulResponse with message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getLocationDetails

        @Deprecated
public LocationResponse getLocationDetails(Long accountId,
                                             Long locationId,
                                             Double distance)
                                    throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. see getRetailerLocationConsumer
        Gets the location details.

        Target API Endpoint: /location/details/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id for returning account information (i.e. favorites)
        locationId - The retailer location id
        distance - The distance of the retailer location from the user's current location (this is returned when the location is searched)
        Returns:
        a LocationResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

                                                Long retailerId,
                                                Boolean includeCounts)
                                                  throws SirqulException
        Gets a retailer. Only the owner and the employees of a retailer have access to view its information.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        retailerId - the ID of the retailer
        includeCounts - the include counts
        Returns:
        A WrappedResponse<RetailerFullResponse> on a valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

        Gets a retailer location. Only the owner and the employees of the retailer have access to view its information.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/location/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        retailerLocationId - The ID of the retailer location
        retailerLocationToken - The unique token of the reailer location
        Returns:
        WrappedResponse<RetailerLocationResponse> on a valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeRetailer

        public SirqulResponse removeRetailer(Long accountId,
                            Long retailerId)
                              throws SirqulException
        Set the deleted timestamp to current time. This effectively deletes the retailer since all queries should ignore any records with a deleted time stamp.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the delete, must have rights to edit the retailer.
        retailerId - The ID of the retailer to be deleted
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeRetailerLocation

        public SirqulResponse removeRetailerLocation(Long accountId,
                                    Long retailerLocationId)
                                      throws SirqulException
        Set the deleted timestamp to current time. This effectively deletes the retailer location since all queries should ignore any records with a deleted time stamp.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/location/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the delete, must have rights to edit the retailer location.
        retailerLocationId - The ID of the retailer location to be deleted
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchRetailerLocations

        public ListResponse<RetailerLocationResponse> searchRetailerLocations(Integer start,
                                                             Integer limit,
                                                             Boolean hasOffers,
                                                             List<Long> categories,
                                                             List<Long> filters,
                                                             String sortField,
                                                             String keyword,
                                                             String booleanQuery)
                                                               throws SirqulException
        Retailer location (faster) indexed search. This searches on any retailer location. Use searchRetailerLocations for searching on retailers that an account has access to (for the Sirqul retailer site).

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/location/isearch
        Parameters:
        start - The start index for pagination
        limit - The limit for pagination
        hasOffers - boolean to indicate whether to include retailer locations that have no offers
        categories - List of category ids
        filters - List of filter ids
        sortField - The field to sort the result set on
        keyword - the keyword
        booleanQuery - the boolean query
        Returns:
        ListResponse<RetailerLocationResponse> on valid response, SirqulResponse on invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
        See Also:
        searchRetailerLocations(java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Boolean, java.util.List<java.lang.Long>, java.util.List<java.lang.Long>, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • searchRetailerLocations

        public SearchResponse<RetailerLocationResponse> searchRetailerLocations(Long accountId,
                                                               String keyword,
                                                               List<Long> retailerIds,
                                                               Enums.RetailerLocationApiMap sortField,
                                                               Boolean descending,
                                                               Integer start,
                                                               Integer limit,
                                                               Boolean activeOnly)
                                                                 throws SirqulException
        Searches on retailer locations that the account has access to.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/location/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        retailerIds - Comma separated list of retailer IDs which when passed in will filter the results to only return these retailers.
        sortField - The column to sort the search on
        descending - determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        start - The record to begin the return set on
        limit - The number of records to return
        activeOnly - Return only active results
        Returns:
        SearchResponse of RetailerLocationResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response Enums.RetailerLocationApiMap
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchRetailerLocationsByRange

        public ListResponse<RetailerLocationResponse> searchRetailerLocationsByRange(Location location,
                                                                    Double searchRange,
                                                                    Integer start,
                                                                    Integer limit,
                                                                    Boolean hasOffers,
                                                                    List<Long> categories,
                                                                    List<Long> filters,
                                                                    Enums.RetailerLocationApiMap sortField,
                                                                    String keyword,
                                                                    String booleanQuery)
                                                                      throws SirqulException
        Search retailer locations by range.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/location/idistancesearch
        Parameters:
        location - the location to center the search on
        searchRange - the search range in kilometers
        start - the start index for pagination
        limit - the limit for pagination
        hasOffers - boolean to indicate whether to include retailer locations that have no offers
        categories - list of category ids
        filters - list of filter ids
        sortField - The field to sort the result set on
        keyword - Search by keyword
        booleanQuery - the boolean query. See http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cloudsearch/latest/developerguide/ searching.html and See http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cloudsearch/latest/developerguide/ booleansearch.html for more details on how to use boolean search.
        Returns:
        a ListResponse of RetailerLocationResponse on success, or SirqulResponse on failure with message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchRetailers

        public SearchResponse<RetailerResponse> searchRetailers(Long accountId,
                                               String keyword,
                                               Enums.RetailerApiMap sortField,
                                               Boolean descending,
                                               Integer start,
                                               Integer limit,
                                               Boolean activeOnly)
                                                 throws SirqulException
        Searches on retailers that the account has access to.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        sortField - The column to sort the search on, type Enums.RetailerApiMap
        descending - determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        start - The record to begin the return set on
        limit - The number of records to return
        activeOnly - Return only active results
        Returns:
        SearchResponse of RetailerResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response Enums.RetailerApiMap
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateAds

        public SirqulResponse updateAds(String appKey,
                       String searchTag,
                       Integer batchCount,
                       Integer maxUpdateSearchIndexRecords)
                         throws SirqulException
        Updates retailers that are marked to be saved to index reporting data.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/location/searchindex/update
        Parameters:
        appKey - The application key - only Sirqul app is allowed
        searchTag - run for rows that have this "searchTags" value - ignores the "insearchindex" value
        batchCount - This number of records to process
        maxUpdateSearchIndexRecords - This maximum records to upload to the AWS search index at once. AWS Search has a 5MB limit for submissions so setting this too high will cause this to error out. Keep in mind that this is either the total number of RetailerLocations OR Offers since the RetailerLocation and Offer indices are updated at the same time. So the first one to reach 1000 records will trigger the save for both.
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateRetailer

        public SirqulResponse updateRetailer(Long accountId,
                            Long retailerId,
                            String name,
                            String streetAddress,
                            String streetAddress2,
                            String city,
                            String state,
                            String postalCode,
                            String businessPhone,
                            String businessPhoneExt,
                            String website,
                            String facebookUrl,
                            String twitterUrl,
                            String logoFilePath,
                            Long logoAssetId,
                            String picture1FilePath,
                            Long picture1AssetId,
                            String picture2FilePath,
                            Long picture2AssetId,
                            List<Long> categoryIds,
                            List<Long> filterIds,
                            Location location,
                            Enums.ResponseFormat responseFormat)
                              throws SirqulException
        Update a retailer record. Only the owner and the employees of the retailer have access to update its information.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        retailerId - The ID of the retailer to update
        name - The name of the retailer
        streetAddress - The street address
        streetAddress2 - Additional address information (such as a suite number, floor number, building name, or PO Box)
        city - The city
        state - The state
        postalCode - The postal code
        businessPhone - The business phone
        businessPhoneExt - The business phone extension
        website - The website of the retailer
        facebookUrl - The facebook URL of the retailer
        twitterUrl - The twitter URL of the retailer
        logoFilePath - File path to the retailer logo sent as a multipart binary file (you can optionally use logoAssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        logoAssetId - The retailer logo asset id
        picture1FilePath - File path to optional store-front pictures or product pictures or etc. A multipart binary file (you can optionally use picture1AssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        picture1AssetId - An asset id
        picture2FilePath - File path to optional store-front pictures or product pictures or etc. A multipart binary file (you can optionally use picture2AssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        picture2AssetId - An asset id
        categoryIds - Comma separated list of category IDs used to filter retailers by categories
        filterIds - Comma separated list of filter IDs used to filter retailers
        location - The current location of the user.
        responseFormat - the response format
        Returns:
        StringResponse if responseFormat equals Enums.ResponseFormat.XML or Enums.ResponseFormat.HTML and a WrappedResponse<RetailerFullResponse> if responseFormat equals any other Enums.ResponseFormat. On error, returns SirqulResponse with message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateRetailerLocation

        public SirqulResponse updateRetailerLocation(Long accountId,
                                    Long retailerLocationId,
                                    String name,
                                    String streetAddress,
                                    String streetAddress2,
                                    String city,
                                    String state,
                                    String postalCode,
                                    String businessPhone,
                                    String businessPhoneExt,
                                    String website,
                                    String internalId,
                                    String detailsHeader,
                                    String detailsBody,
                                    String hours,
                                    String logoFilePath,
                                    Long logoAssetId,
                                    String picture1FilePath,
                                    Long picture1AssetId,
                                    String picture2FilePath,
                                    Long picture2AssetId,
                                    List<Long> categoryIds,
                                    List<Long> filterIds,
                                    Location location,
                                    String building,
                                    Enums.ResponseFormat responseFormat)
                                      throws SirqulException
        Updates a location record for a retailer. Only the owner and the employees of the retailer have access to do this.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/location/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        retailerLocationId - The ID of the retailer location
        name - The name of the retailer location
        streetAddress - The street address of the retailer location
        streetAddress2 - Additional address information (such as a suite number, floor number, building name, or PO Box)
        city - The city
        state - The state
        postalCode - The postal code
        businessPhone - The business phone
        businessPhoneExt - The business phone extension
        website - The website of the retailer location
        internalId - An internal identifier used by the retailer
        detailsHeader - A brief description about the retailer location (255 character limit)
        detailsBody - A detailed description about the retailer location
        hours - The hours of operation
        logoFilePath - The file path to the retailer location logo sent as a multipart binary file (you can optionally use logoAssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        logoAssetId - The retailer location logo asset id
        picture1FilePath - The file path to an optional store-front pictures or product pictures or etc. A multipart binary file (you can optionally use picture1AssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        picture1AssetId - An asset id
        picture2FilePath - The file path to an optional store-front pictures or product pictures or etc. A multipart binary file (you can optionally use picture2AssetId if the asset has already been uploaded before)
        picture2AssetId - An asset id
        categoryIds - Comma separated list of category IDs used to filter retailer locations by categories
        filterIds - Comma separated list of filter IDs used to filter retailer locations
        location - The current location of the user
        building - the building
        responseFormat - The format of the returned response {JSON // default , HTML // for Dojo support when uploading assets}
        Returns:
        StringResponse if responseFormat equals Enums.ResponseFormat.XML or Enums.ResponseFormat.HTML and a WrappedResponse<RetailerLocationResponse> if responseFormat equals any other Enums.ResponseFormat. On error, returns SirqulResponse with message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
